mcpServers._comment: Optional MCP servers. Set `enabled: true` to activate and ensure the command exists on PATH.

http_fetch.notes: Generic HTTP fetch; useful for HEAD/GET without full browser.

clipboard.notes: Access system clipboard (use with care; prefer read-only).

git.notes: Read-only git history/diff unless explicitly allowed.

openapi_local.notes: Enable contract-aware queries against local OpenAPI file.

docker.notes: Container introspection; keep read-only by default.
